mapper.sql: t_house_user_asset_history . id , t_house_user_asset_history.user_id AS userId, t_house_user_asset_history.asset_id AS assetId, t_house_user_asset_history.trust, t_house_user_asset_history.rent_status AS rentStatus, t_house_user_asset_history.create_time AS createTime, t_house_user_asset_history.note, t_house_user_asset_history.final_flag AS finalFlag, t_house_user_asset_history.user_type AS userType, t_house_user_asset_history.locked, t_house_user_asset_history.unlike
mapper.select: SELECT t_house_user_asset_history.* FROM t_house_user_asset_history WHERE t_house_user_asset_history.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_house_user_asset_history.id

SELECT
FROM t_house_user_asset_history
WHERE 1=1
AND t_house_user_asset_history.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_house_user_asset_history.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.userId},'%')
AND t_house_user_asset_history.asset_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.assetId},'%')
AND t_house_user_asset_history.trust LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.trust},'%')
AND t_house_user_asset_history.rent_status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.rentStatus},'%')
AND t_house_user_asset_history.create_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.createTime},'%')
AND t_house_user_asset_history.note LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.note},'%')
AND t_house_user_asset_history.final_flag LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.finalFlag},'%')
AND t_house_user_asset_history.user_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.userType},'%')
AND t_house_user_asset_history.locked LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.locked},'%')
AND t_house_user_asset_history.unlike LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.unlike},'%')
AND t_house_user_asset_history.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_house_user_asset_history.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
ORDER BY create_time DESC
